pullRequest.title: FM2-225:Add buildDelete static method for FhirProviderUtils

nodes.bodyText:
Depending on the server outcome, IssueSeverity can be either ERROR, FATAL, WARNING or INFORMATION. So this should be dynamic.
More information about OperationOutcome here
i set issueSeverity.ERROR  as it should be supposed to be
@sherrif10 Actually, this should be `IssueSeverity.INFORMATION, because we're sending a result that says the object was successfully deleted. No error occurred. I've made that change.

commit.message:
FM2-225:Add buildDelete static method for FhirProviderUtils
